name: KnightSlide
description:
KnightSlide is a game where the movement mechanic slides you and you only stop when you hit something.

Collect skulls to gain Tokens (abilities), but you lose Tokens (abilities) as you lose skulls when you are attacked by a monster (if you stop adjacent to a monster they attack you).  Monsters you hit are stunned.

This is a very pre-alpha build, and it's very much a work in progress.

This is my first time publicly showing one of my many game prototypes!

Controls: WASD is movement, ENTER is restart level.

Credits can be seen in game, or in my main blog: https://mygamedesignscom.wordpress.com
